The number of packets for the kx frame cannot be less than 0
KEY_BEACON_&_MAINTENANCE.THE_NUMBER_OF_PACKETS_FOR_THE_RC_FRAME_C: The number of packets for the rc frame cannot be greater than 65535
The number of packets for the rc frame cannot be less than 0

Watch dog frame interval value cannot be less than 0s
